titles.title: JP202 Praise him, praise him in the morning

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise him, praise him,
Praise him in the morning,
Praise him in the noon-time,
Praise him, praise him,
Praise him when the sun goes down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Thank him, trust him,
Thank him in the morning,
Thank him in the noon-time,
Thank him, trust him,
Thank him when the sun goes down.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Love him, serve him,
Love him in the morning,
Love him in the noon-time,
Love him, serve him,
Love him when the sun goes down.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Serve him, praise him,
Serve him in the morning,
Serve him in the noon-time,
Serve him, praise him,
Serve him when the sun goes down.
